net.corda.core.contracts

Class TransactionVerificationException.ConstraintPropagationRejection

  • Enclosing class:
    TransactionVerificationException

    public static class TransactionVerificationException.ConstraintPropagationRejection

    This exception happens when a transaction was not built correctly. When a contract is not annotated with annotationclass NoConstraintPropagation, then the platform ensures that the constraints of output states transition correctly from input states.

    See Also:
    annotationclass NoConstraintPropagation

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConstraintPropagationRejection

        This exception happens when a transaction was not built correctly. When a contract is not annotated with annotationclass NoConstraintPropagation, then the platform ensures that the constraints of output states transition correctly from input states.

public java.lang.String getContractClass()
